Sept. 16, 1978 D North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Three)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Three) 430 Own Choice Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest-third-section
Test Piece Contest
Peter Schmoll
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £50 and trophy, 2nd £30, 3rd £20. 20th annual contest. 6 bands competed.
Sept. 11, 2013, 10:09 p.m. March 30, 2017, 6:23 a.m.
1 Matlock Band Murray Slater
2 Maltby Miners Welfare Band Julie Holling
3 Langwith Miners Welfare Robert Moss
Unknown Result Clipstone Colliery Welfare Keith Wardle
Unknown Result Dove Holes Band R. Ball
